java/liquibase/SwingUIFacade.java

00001 package liquibase;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00005 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00006 
00007 import javax.swing.*;
00008 
00009 public class SwingUIFacade implements UIFacade {
00014     public boolean promptForNonLocalDatabase(Database database) throws JDBCException {
00015         return JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null, "You are running a database migration against a non-local database." + StreamUtil.getLineSeparator() +
00016                 "Database URL is: " + database.getConnectionURL() + StreamUtil.getLineSeparator() +
00017                 "Username is: " + database.getConnectionUsername() + StreamUtil.getLineSeparator() + StreamUtil.getLineSeparator() +
00018                 "Area you sure you want to do this?",
00019                 "Confirm", JOptionPane.YES_NO_OPTION, JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE) == JOptionPane.NO_OPTION;
00020     }
00021 
00022 }
